page.title: 11MOTTINGHAM WEEK
page.content: On Saturday 8th June it was the first day of Mottingham Week.We have a festival every 2 years there is a fete and a carnival.The fete was at the playing fields. {The Carnival} came at 2.30.There were many fascinating floats and lorries with colourful people.The theme was Â£Past and Present'.Our float was an Edwardian school.Our head, Mrs. Swallow was the teacher with a straw hat,a pair of glasses,a cane and a long skirt.The children sat in rows dressed in aprons, dresses and ribbons for the girls and trousers and caps for the boys.Kieron was the dunce with the pointed hat with the big D on the front.All the other floats were also good with characers such as clowns,Indians and army forces. The majorettes were marching and the scouts and karate were following too.
